mapper.select: SELECT MEMAIL, MNAME FROM MSM_MEMBER WHERE MEMAIL = #{mEmail}
SELECT MID, MNAME FROM MSM_MEMBER WHERE MID = #{mId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSM_MEMBER ( MID, MPW, MNAME, MEMAIL, MPHONE, MZIP_CODE, M_FIRST_ADDR, M_SECOND_ADDR ) VALUES ( #{mId}, #{mPw}, #{mName}, #{mEmail}, #{mPhone}, #{mZip_Code}, #{mFirst_Addr}, #{mSecond_Addr} )
mapper.select: SELECT MID, MPW, MNAME, MEMAIL, MPHONE, MZIP_CODE, M_FIRST_ADDR AS mFirst_Addr, M_SECOND_ADDR AS mSecond_Addr, ENABLED, REGDATE, AUTHORITYNAME AS authority FROM MSM_MEMBER WHERE MID = #{mId}

SELECT MID, MPW, MNAME, MEMAIL, MPHONE, MZIP_CODE, M_FIRST_ADDR AS mFirst_Addr, M_SECOND_ADDR AS mSecond_Addr, ENABLED, REGDATE, AUTHORITYNAME AS authority FROM ( SELECT MID, MPW, MNAME, MEMAIL, MPHONE, MZIP_CODE, M_FIRST_ADDR, M_SECOND_ADDR, ENABLED, REGDATE, AUTHORITYNAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MID DESC) AS RNUM FROM MSM_MEMBER WHERE 1=1
) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY MID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MSM_MEMBER SET MEMAIL = #{mEmail}, MPHONE = #{mPhone}, MZIP_CODE = #{mZip_Code}, M_FIRST_ADDR = #{mFirst_Addr}, M_SECOND_ADDR = #{mSecond_Addr} WHERE MID = #{mId}
